notesStmt.note: Primary text covers one side; verso is empty, save for a later inscription of two writing exercises in Arabic, one in Arabic characters. A complete representation of the Hebrew version is provided, each verse is followed by its Arabic translation. The Arabic version is almost identical with the version published by Derenbourg, Paris 1893, p. 157. The copy covers this biblical paragraph completely. It is possible that this is not from a codex, rather a single page.
